author: Staff Reporter
text:
As many as 14,337 students – 6,556 boys and 7,781 girls will appear for the plus two examinations in Puducherry and Karaikal commencing on March 4. A release said that as many as 35 centres have been established in Puducherry and Karaikal.

In Puducherry, a total of 12,080 students, including 6,513 girls and 5,567 boys will appear for the exams in 27 centres.

In Karaikal, 2257 students including 757 private students will take the examinations in 8 centres.

The administration has made elaborate arrangements in all centres. A number of special squads have been formed to prevent malpractices. All centres would be provided with police security.

Invigilators have been given the task of matching the photograph in the name list and hall ticket to prevent impersonation and tough action will be taken against those indulging in malpractices.
title: Plus-Two exams from tomorrow
